metadata.title: CVE-2024-43359 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: ZoneMinder is a free, open source closed-circuit television softwareapplication. ZoneMinder has a cross-site scripting vulnerability in themontagereview via the displayinterval, speed, and scale parameters. Thisvulnerability is fixed in 1.36.34 and 1.37.61.

criterions.comment: zoneminder package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
